thread.section_title: New Mexico High School Sports Headlines
thread.title: High School Football Recruiting Report

title: High School Football Recruiting Report
text:
High School Football Recruiting Report Kyle Henderson Talk about it in NEW MEXICO PREP FOOTBALL INSIDER 
Did you know there are 21 current New Mexico High School Football Players that hold an offer to play college football? Today we highlight those 21 student athletes with a recruiting update. 
Already a subscriber? Click Here 
Pictured is Eldorado Running Back/Linebacker Noah Sweitzer who holds offers from: Adams State, Western State Colorado, Highlands, Eastern New Mexico, and Ft. Lewis. He has also recently been contacted by Hawaii.
